name: CRITICS-The rise of weed part-1 beta 1.2
name_original: CRITICS-The rise of weed part-1 beta 1.2
description:
This is the first part of this series....

people of this realm think you are worthless 

prove them wrong  if u have the guts ;)

prequel to the upcoming series "CRITICS-the rise of weed"

*it is a satire game and some languages can be considered bad by the players

player is advised before hand
